title: Reasoning & Planning
description: Can the model break down a complex goal into a logical sequence of smaller, executable steps?

title: Tool Use Reliability
description: How reliably can the model call functions/tools with the correct arguments and handle their outputs to inform its next action?

title: Resilience
description: When a tool fails or an unexpected event occurs, can the agent recover, re-plan, and still attempt to complete its goal?

title: Cost & Speed
description: Agentic workflows can involve many model calls, so the cost and latency of the chosen model are critical factors for user experience.
